hero.headline: Sysadmin · DevOps · Homelab
hero.subheadline: Building resilient systems that just work. From district networks to Proxmox clusters, automation-first.

paragraphs: I manage infrastructure at scale — from school district networks to my own lab. I like clean architecture, observability, and automations that save future-me.
Currently experimenting with GPU passthrough for local AI (Ollama), HA-driven weather alerts, and Cloudflare Zero Trust.
